08e2079f-4fe6-4625-b920-d17689985de3.name: apisix_instance
08e2079f-4fe6-4625-b920-d17689985de3.queryValue:
SELECT distinct JSONExtractString(labels, 'hostname')
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE (metric_name = 'apisix_http_status')

183c6709-cbdc-4af1-8413-2dc26d0458d8.name: uri
183c6709-cbdc-4af1-8413-2dc26d0458d8.queryValue:
SELECT distinct JSONExtractString(labels, 'uri')
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE (metric_name = 'apisix_http_status')
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'uri') != '')
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'hostname') in {{.apisix_instance}})
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'http_host') in {{.gateway_ip_port}})

40bbb6c8-b187-4757-b436-40a25da3073c.name: gateway_ip_port
40bbb6c8-b187-4757-b436-40a25da3073c.queryValue:
SELECT distinct JSONExtractString(labels, 'http_host')
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE (metric_name = 'apisix_http_status')
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'hostname') in {{.apisix_instance}})

87107f68-fdbb-489f-9bd7-bbed6db26e03.name: target_pod_ip_port
87107f68-fdbb-489f-9bd7-bbed6db26e03.queryValue:
SELECT distinct JSONExtractString(labels, 'upstream_addr')
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE (metric_name = 'apisix_http_status')
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'uri') in {{.uri}})
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'route') in {{.route_id}})

c6fa20bb-6d5b-43f4-a76d-1a66b18a6a5f.name: route_id
c6fa20bb-6d5b-43f4-a76d-1a66b18a6a5f.queryValue:
SELECT distinct JSONExtractString(labels, 'route')
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE (metric_name = 'apisix_http_status')
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'uri') != '')
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'route') != '')

widgets.title: Requests per second (RPS) by status code

filter.expression: uri in ['.uri'] AND hostname in ['.apisix_instance'] AND type IN ['request']
uri in ['.uri'] AND hostname in ['.apisix_instance'] AND type IN ['request']
uri in ['.uri'] AND hostname in ['.apisix_instance'] AND type IN ['request']
type IN ['apisix'] AND hostname IN ['.apisix_instance'] AND uri IN ['.uri']
type IN ['apisix'] AND hostname IN ['.apisix_instance'] AND uri IN ['.uri']
type IN ['apisix'] AND hostname IN ['.apisix_instance'] AND uri IN ['.uri']
type IN ['upstream'] AND hostname IN ['.apisix_instance'] AND uri IN ['.uri']
type IN ['upstream'] AND hostname IN ['.apisix_instance'] AND uri IN ['.uri']
type IN ['upstream'] AND hostname IN ['.apisix_instance'] AND uri IN ['.uri']
